Rulings.Goat: ●The owner of “Nimble Momonga” will get the increase in LP if “Nimble Momonga” is destroyed in battle, regardless of who controlled “Nimble Momonga.”

Rulings.Cat:
● The owner of 'Nimble Momonga' activates its effect because it activates in its owner's GY.
● Gaining LP is mandatory, but Special Summoning 'Nimble Momonga' from the Deck isn't. You Special Summon the 'Nimble Momonga' when you gain the LP.

Rulings.Base: 1. The owner of "Nimble Momonga" activates its effect because it activates in its owner's GY.\n2. Gaining Life Points is mandatory, but Special Summoning "Nimble Momonga" from the Deck is not. You Special Summon the "Nimble Momonga" when you gain the Life Points.

PSCT.Base: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Gain 1000 Life Points, then you can Special Summon any number of "Nimble Momongas" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.
